packages.name: Agra Heritage Tour
packages.description: Explore the rich history of Agra with visits to the Taj Mahal, Agra Fort, and Fatehpur Sikri.

packages.name: Sunrise at Taj Mahal
packages.description: Witness the breathtaking sunrise at the Taj Mahal, followed by a guided tour of the monument.

packages.name: Agra Food Walk
packages.description: Indulge in Agra's culinary delights with a guided food tour through the city's famous eateries.

packages.name: Mughal Architecture Tour
packages.description: Dive deep into Mughal architecture with visits to lesser-known monuments and a detailed guide.

packages.name: Yamuna River Boat Ride
packages.description: Enjoy a serene boat ride on the Yamuna River with a unique view of the Taj Mahal from the water.
